name: Unbelievable Deals Of Loving
description:
Game about trying to attract your forgotten family members to your apartment by buying cool stuff on tv-shops.

Created for LD37 Jam in 72 hours.

Game design, programming by me.

Art by @mifmorerak.

Instructions:

Buy things to add charm to the apartment. As your charm grows, more family members will arrive. If you don't order anything, they become bored, and the apartment charm will decrease! Present family members earn money.

Switch Channels(different deals) with arrow keys.

Order stuff by typing the needed codes on the keyboard.
